data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Hi! My module Win32::Printer is developed for my job where I need
    it for printing lots of vareous type of information (I have used it
    for printing more than one million pages by now!). The aproach of
    this namespace is to contain modules for high performance Win32
    printing solutions, Win32 printer management, modules for using
    number of high performance desktop printers as a mainframe priners.
    It is not intended for general GDI interfacing like Win32::GUI.

    Kind regards, Edgars BinÄns
